top_comments.comment: Are you up for the challenge? I am demonstrating the stretches at a beginner level in this video but if it’s too easy you can go deeper into them 💙
I can do the splits now!! I have been practicing for a long time with your stretching routines every week and i have gotten so flexible!! Love you anna!❤❤✨👍
I can do it. Nice  I can do the split, aerial, chest band, 💜💜💜💙💙💙🤗🤗

comments_since_last_sample.body: Anna sister  daily 1 hour deep stretch for intermediate. Pls
I can do the splits now!! I have been practicing for a long time with your stretching routines every week and i have gotten so flexible!! Love you anna!❤❤✨👍
so excited to try this one!!
I LOVE your videos anna! You inspired me to make a goal to get as much strength and flexibility as possible to try to be able to do contortion! I just don’t know where to start
